org.orgName: United States Circuit Court For Ninth Judicial Circuit

div1.p: In the Circuit Court of the United States District of Washington Northern Division
In the matter of the petition of Charles W. Nordstrom for writ of Habeas Corpus and writ thereon
Filed in the U.S. Circuit Court Aug 8 1901
James Hamilton Lewis, Attorney for Petitioner
Offices: Fourth Floor Pioneer Block. Corner First Ave. and James St. Seattle, Wash.
United States of America District of Washington

James Hamilton Lewis being duly sworn, deposes and says that he is Attorney in the foregoing Petitions; that he has read the same, and knows the contents theoreof, and that the same is true to his belief that he makes this verification because the sections in
James Hamilton Lewis Subscribed and sworn to before me this 25 day of July 1901,
A.J. McBride Notary Public in and for the State of Washington, Residence at Seattle
